image.name: helperMaskFileName
image.label: Helper mask file name
image.description: Help mask file name. The helper mask is a crude lung segmentation that \ can be supplied to assist the segmentation for difficult cases.

string.name: ctDir
string.label: CT directory name
string.description: Directory containing DICOM images to segment.

integer.name: lowerClipValue
integer.description: Lower clip value applied to input image before segmentation. \ Everything below the clip value will be assigned the replacement value.
integer.label: Lower clip value

integer.name: lowerReplacementValue
integer.description: Lower replacement value applied to input image before segmentation. \ Everything below the clip value will be assigned the replacement value.
integer.label: Lower replacement value

integer.name: upperClipValue
integer.description: Upper clip value applied to input image before segmentation. \ Everything above the clip value will be assigned the replacement value.
integer.label: Upper clip value

integer.name: upperReplacementValue
integer.description: Upper replacement value applied to input image before segmentation. \ Everything above the clip value will be assigned the replacement value.
integer.label: Upper replacement value

integer.name: lungSplitRadius
integer.description: Radius used to split the left and right lungs.
integer.label: Lung split radius

boolean.name: headFirst
boolean.description: Indicates if scan is head first.
boolean.label: Head first
